 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָקָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==pressure== (si vera lectio, Aramaic word, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָֽקְתָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — only construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָקַת רָשָׁע‎</span> [[Ps.55.4|Ps 55:4]] ***because of the pressure of the wicked***; &gt; read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַעֲקַת‎</span> (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺל‎</span>; [[BDB#Ol|Ol]] and others), which means ***cry for help***.
